title: Shaza chairs PSEB board meeting
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP):Minister of State for Information Technology and Telecommunication, Shaza Fatima Khawaja Thursday chaired the 60th Board of Directors meeting of the Pakistan Software Export Board (PSEB).
Secretary IT Captain (Retd) Muhammad Mahmood was also present, said a news release.
Chairman of the Pakistan Software Houses Association (P@SHA), Muhammad Zohaib Khan, attended the meeting via video link.
The meeting discussed the mandate and functions of the Pakistan Software Export Board.
